mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ol.order_no AS order_no, ol.user_no AS user_no, ol.order_use_coupon AS order_use_coupon, ol.order_dlv_fee AS order_dlv_fee, ol.order_total_price AS order_total_price, ol.order_delivery_info AS order_delivery_info, ol.order_status AS order_status, ol.order_date AS order_date, ol.order_update_date AS order_update_date, po.product_no AS product_no, po.quantity AS quantity, p.product_name AS product_name FROM order_list ol JOIN product_order po ON ol.order_no = po.order_no JOIN product p ON po.product_no = p.product_no ORDER BY order_date DESC
